::Lord Elder/Grimlock/Kup::

Elder is now with Jotunn.

Elder: This is a touch situation. Rodimus is doing what he thinks is best. He would rather put this all on himself rather then risk more lives here. He is an Autobot and a leader at heart. His own honor as the Matrix bearer is on the line. I hope he can win because we can't afford to let the Minions get the Matrix.

Grimlock walks up.

Grimlock: Me Grimlock see Rodimus fight Cyclonus many times. Rodimus always win. Cyclonus fool.

Kup is climbing up out of the water and finds the party, shocked by Grimlock's voice.

Kup: Grimlock! Is that you, you big bozo?

Grimlock: Me Grimlock no bozo me king.... KUP!

Kup: I take it you guys are reinforcements from the Maximal city in the sky, eh? I'm Kup of the Autobots. Well formerly of the Autobots anyway.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Remus took to the air, not caring or even realizing that interfering
 could be seen as an act of war. However, He simply guards Rodimus
 while he travels to the Island.
 
 Jotunn: You fool, Rodimus. You're doing exactly what he wants you to.
 
 He had to think fast.
 
 Jotunn: Elder, Perseus, if we lose the Matrix, should we risk it
 leaving with the minions?
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime/Kup::
 > 
 > As all the fire power was converged on Cyclonus, Rodimus realized
 that Cyclonus had agreed to the one on one battle and that the Sweeps
 had all stopped their assualt.
 > 
 > Rodimus raised his hand to get all the Maximals attention. He opened
 a comm on all Maximal and Autobot channels.
 > 
 > Rodimus Prime: The Minion forces are standing down. Cease fire
 immediately. Cyclonus and myself will remove ourselves from Atlantis.
 There is an island not to far away in which Cyclonus and I will battle
 one on one. They came for me and I will do this to protect the Maximal
 population of Atlantis. Rodimus out.
 > 
 > Rodimus looked at Cyclonus and pointed out at sea towards the island
 he was speaking of.
 > 
 > Rodimus: There. I will leave now on one of Atlantis' boats. You of
 course can fly there. Once we are gone have all the Minions leave
 Atlantis.
 > 
 > Rodimus swims over to one of the patrol boats and climbs aboard. He
 allows it's passengers to off load.
 > 
 > Kup swims over to the side.
 > 
 > Kup: Roddy, don't do this. Don't sacrifice yourself. We all would
 stand with you.
 > 
 > Rodimus: Just take care of Nightlight and Elita for me. Please.
 > 
 > Rodimus heads out towards the island on the small patrol boat.
 > 
 > ::Lord Elder::
 > 
 > Elder listened in on the comm message and sighed. This was bad.
 Elder had Cyclonus laser targeted for air gun ships but that would be
 useless now. Elder knew that if Rodimus Prime lost this battle then
 the Minions would have exactly what the wanted. The Matrix.
 > 
 >  __________________________________________________
 > Do You Yahoo!?
 > Tired of spam?  Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
 > http://mail.yahoo.com
 >
